message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $12,000.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $12,000 is a bit higher than I was hoping for. I'm really interested in this product, and I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I've done some research and I know this product is worth more than $10,000 to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counter with $11,500. What do you think?
